animatedMovies.title: Son of Batman
animatedMovies.plot: Batman discovers his son, raised by the League of Assassins, and must protect him from Deathstroke.

animatedMovies.title: Batman Hush
animatedMovies.plot: Batman faces a new villain, Hush, who manipulates Gotham's underworld while targeting him personally.

animatedMovies.title: Young Justice
animatedMovies.plot: A team of young superheroes, mentored by the Justice League, navigate missions and personal challenges while proving themselves as heroes.

animatedMovies.title: Batman: Soul of the Dragon
animatedMovies.plot: Batman joins forces with his former martial arts classmates to battle a deadly menace from their past.

animatedMovies.title: Big Hero 6
animatedMovies.plot: A young robotics prodigy, Hiro Hamada, teams up with his inflatable healthcare companion, Baymax, and friends to stop a mysterious villain in San Fransokyo.

animatedMovies.title: Wish
animatedMovies.plot: A young girl named Asha makes a heartfelt wish upon a star, only to have it answered in an unexpected way that changes her world forever.

animatedMovies.title: Ratatouille
animatedMovies.plot: A rat named Remy dreams of becoming a great chef and tries to achieve his goal by forming an unlikely alliance with a young kitchen worker in a famous Paris restaurant.

animatedMovies.title: Kung Fu Panda 2
animatedMovies.plot: Po and the Furious Five set out to defeat a new enemy, Lord Shen, who has a powerful weapon that threatens to conquer China and destroy kung fu.

animatedMovies.title: Demon Slayer: Mugen Train
animatedMovies.plot: Tanjiro and his friends join the Flame Hashira, Kyojuro Rengoku, to investigate a series of disappearances aboard the Mugen Train, only to face a powerful demon threat.

animatedMovies.title: Batman Ninja
animatedMovies.plot: Batman and his allies are transported to feudal Japan, where they must battle the Joker and other villains who have become feudal lords.
